mapper.select: SELECT est_id, user_id, cur_id, estname, estdate FROM (SELECT est_id, user_id, cur_id, estname, estdate, rownum FROM estimates ORDER BY rownum DESC) WHERE rownum = 1
SELECT est_id, user_id, cur_id, estname, estdate FROM estimates WHERE user_id = #{value} ORDER BY est_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO estimates(est_id, user_id, cur_id, estname, estdate) VALUES (ESTID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{curId}, #{estName}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO prodlists(prol_id, est_id, prol_kind, prod_id, anl_ans) VALUES(PROLID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{estId}, #{prolKind}, #{prodId}, #{anlAns})
